bibl.title: The Speech "On the Peace" of Isocrates from the British Museum Papyrus 132.
bibl.note: P. lit. Lond. 131 (= Pack2 1272). - This article was delivered in the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists at Oxford, on the 30th of June 1974. - Également publié dans: EEAth 24, 2 (1973-1974) pp. 912-921.
Mandilaras Basil G., The Speech "On the Peace" of Isocrates from the British Museum Papyrus 132.
